channel.title: Help with 508 please :)
channel.description:
i need help with some 508 stuff :D
1. when i run the client the client stop at the loading and i cant log in.
2. how to add commands and what to add instead off the 317 commands.
3. how to make pk point system
4. how to make owner commands but i so noone except me can use it and maybe the co owner
5. how to make jad and stuff like that come in waves.
thx for reading please help me :D

item.title: Help with 508 please :)
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

  1. You have to have the server running BEFORE starting the client, otherwise it won’t load.
  2. Commands.java? Sound a tad like what you’re looking for?
  3. You have to work some things out for yourself…
  4. 508’s only have mods and admins, so I’m led to believe you can’t.
  5. Once again, work things out for yourself.

Read full topic
